main event: Three members of the military at Keesler AFB, Mississippi reported sighting an unidentified flying object on the night of 27 February 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as round and bright, splitting into two before disappearing., The duration of the observation was approximately five seconds., Witnesses concluded it likely indicated a meteor due to its characteristics., The object was estimated to be 15 to 20 feet in diameter., The sighting occurred during clear weather at night.
